      • BROADCAST_RECEIVER_ACTION_MESSAGE

        public static java.lang.String BROADCAST_RECEIVER_ACTION_MESSAGE
        Action for Wigzo Messaging BroadcastReceiver. Once message is arrived, Wigzo Messaging will send a broadcast notification with action "APP_PACKAGE_NAME.wigzo.messaging" to which you can subscribe via BroadcastReceiver.
